about_the_game:
Welcome to KABUKI FIRE, the annual jungle-shooter tournament! Every year adventurers from all around the world gather on a forgotten island to test their shooting-skills. The arena, simply called "The Lodge", was once a flourishing holiday resort but the place was shut down after a devastating zombie-virus took over the island. Since those days the little spot under the Polynesian moon is infamously known as the... BLACK ISLAND. As one of the contestants you have 5 minutes to repel swarms of Zombie Mosquitoes and Kabuki Dragons, collect bonus-objects and last but not least... SURVIVE!!

Test your reflexes and precision in this quirky hand-painted 2D side-scrolling-shooter. The goal is to score points by shooting enemies and bonus-objects within a time-frame of 5 minutes. Climb up the high-score table and reach the rank of black-belt (or even the legendary red-belt). As the time-counter progresses, your enemies are getting more aggressive and are furiously throwing dragon-fire and zombie-slime at you. Although you have unlimited ammo at your disposal, you are required to reload your gun regularly! Some enemies leave bonus-objects in the arena after they vanish. These bonuses can be cached and stored in the inventory, to be released in a strategic moment or used immediately as they appear. The arsenal of bonuses includes...

  • The Chain Bomb

  • The Mighty Hammer

  • The Ice Golem

  • The Razor-Blades

  • The Rockets

  • The Plasma Storm

  • The Distracting Doll (Dragons love it!)

  • and many more!

Kabuki Dragons appear in different variations, this year's tournament feature...

  • Green Dragon - Poisonous Breath

  • Blue Dragon - Icy Breath

  • Red Dragon - Fire Breath

  • Hand-painted 2D artwork

  • Many bonus-objects like dragon-fire, chain-bombs and mighty hammers!

  • 1 arena

  • Approximately 5 minutes playtime per game, perfect for your lunch-break!

  • Martial Arts style belt-system (start as a white-belt and reach the higher ranks!)

  • Achievements

  • Unique atmosphere

  • Easy to learn game-mechanics but hard to master!

name: KABUKI FIRE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP, 2000, 98
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Every year the best shooters meet on a small forgotten island to compete and test their skills. Grab your gun and join the party!!
